p:
TWS from GRACE is derived from the sum of soil moisture, groundwater, surface water, snow and ice, and has been successfully used as a drought and vegetation activity indicator in previous studies
44, 45 . In this application it is used as a proxy for soil water availability. GRACE data are standardized using the same approach as the soil moisture data for the model analysis (both by its minimum value spatially and standard deviation temporally, Equation 3).
